tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_assessments (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    assessment_date DATE,
    assessed_by VARCHAR(100),
    assessment_details TEXT,
    mitigation_measures TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE environmental_assessments (
  assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  estimated_impact DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE mitigation_measures (
  measure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  assessment_id INT,
  measure_description TEXT,
  effectiveness VARCHAR(50),
  cost_estimate DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (assessment_id) REFERENCES environmental_assessments(assessment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_assessments (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    assessment_date DATE,
    assessed_by VARCHAR(255),
    assessment_results TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE mitigation_measures (
    measure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_id INT,
    measure_description TEXT,
    measure_effectiveness VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (assessment_id) REFERENCES environmental_impact_assessments(assessment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE geothermal_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    project_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalImpactAssessment (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    assessment_date DATE,
    assessors VARCHAR(100),
    impact_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MitigationMeasures (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_id INT,
    measure_name VARCHAR(100),
    measure_description TEXT,
    effectiveness VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE GeothermalProject (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    capacity FLOAT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Reporting (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    assessment_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    reporter VARCHAR(100),
    report_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE geothermal_projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_assessments (
  assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  assessment_date DATE,
  impact_summary TEXT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_project_id FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES geothermal_projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_stakeholders (
  project_id INT,
  stakeholder_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (project_id, stakeholder_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_project_id FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES geothermal_projects(project_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_stakeholder_id FOREIGN KEY (stakeholder_id) REFERENCES stakeholders(stakeholder_id)
);
